name: azure-nodejs
description: Azure Functions sample for the Serverless framework

scripts.deploy: npx typescript --lib es2017,dom handler && date +'var BUILD_TIME = "%c"' | tee -a handler.js && chamber exec azure/test1 -- npx serverless deploy
scripts.start: npx typescript --lib es2017,dom handler && RUN_CONSOLE=1 chamber exec azure/test1 -- node handler
